overview: Lacy is a budding filmmaker who recently purchased a digital video camera. Not quite sure how the camera works, Lacy leaves it with her friend Jill while she goes off. But while Lacy is away, Jill inadvertently leaves the camera on and accidentally records her hot afternoon with her boyfriend. The on-camera results cause Lacy to have an idea for her latest film.
tagline: The Best Way to Learn is To Experiment.
title: Educating Lacy
